name: Combat
description: Governs skills that directly improve the combat effectiveness of the piloted ship.

name: Leadership
description: Governs skills that improve the combat effectiveness of the fleet as a whole, and skills that improve the effectiveness of fighters.

name: Technology
description: Governs a wide range of skills that primarily improve both the combat and non-combat performance of the fleet.

name: Industry
description: Governs a range of skills to do with salvaging and exploration.
